channel.title: RS-44 on New blog of OK1CDJ
channel.description: Recent content in RS-44 on New blog of OK1CDJ

item.title: October 2025 DX Highlights
item.description: October 2025 Logbook Analysis: Rare DX and Band Activity October 2025 delivered an outstanding month of radio propagation, allowing me (SV0SYH, KN10LO) to log some nice DXs, particularly spanning the vast Pacific Ocean and securing contacts with rare entities in Africa and the Caribbean.
